CSI API ETABS v1

cOptions Methods

The cOptions type exposes the following members.

Methods
NameDescription
GetDefaultFunctionFolder
Returns the default folder to (recursively) search if a function data file is not found in the specified path or in the model folder. This is a global setting for the user and applies to all models.
SetDefaultFunctionFolder
Sets the default folder to (recursively) search if a function data file is not found in the specified path or in the model folder. This is a global setting for the user and applies to all models.
